DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this trial is to demonstrate bioequivalence of a newly developed fixed dose combination (FDC) tablet containing empagliflozin and metformin extended release compared to the free combination of empagliflozin and metformin extended release under fed conditions.
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence of a Fixed Dose Combination Tablet of Empagliflozin/Metformin Extended Release Compared With Mono Compound Tablets in Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Healthy male and female subjects Exclusion criteria: Any relevant deviation from healthy condition.
